listitem.para: External URL handling
when marking a text fragment as URL, then, if the text fragment starts with http:// or https://, then use the fragment as default for the HREF
Also open the url editor immediately when marking a fragment as URL
Search functionality
Need to find a concept for navigation - currently an issue when switching between notepads and then selecting the search result from an earlier search!
Navigation to title page fails (since its page id is "None")
Add page name to article's <title> tag
List related

para.emphasis: List where the next level is indented more than one additional level misses a <listitem> tag
List where the first item starts with a level > 1 has too many </listitem> tags

listitem.para: List format not reflected in Block style toolbar
Unindent List must add item to right list (important for numbered / ordered lists)

Editing a list of keyword links is a mess - the format of the previous list item is taken, thus effectively inserting a keyword link - even if resetting the format, once the list item content is deleted to its beginning (with backspace), when entering new characters, again the format from the previous item is used.
Update Browser when new page is created - done, but item is not yet created at the right location!
UNDO/REDO state not reset when saving a page

para.emphasis: Make XMLExporter more robust - must not destroy existing page!!!

listitem.para: How to delete / rename pages? Should we maintain a global "database" of pages and their links? Would allow to query the database to build the browser tree instead of loading the page to get its links. The database needs to be updated when a page is saved (we have a current list of linked pages there). Would also allow to add features like "what links here" and "where does this page link"
Copy&Paste should support format - currently only plain text is copied into the clipboard
support of numbered (ordered) lists
Return key inside block (e.g. inside code block)
Tab key - inside lists, should increase indent
Back and Forward navigation
Rework page creation - especially on Dropbox, requires too many roundtrips
Maintain creation date and last update date for each page
Clean up unused image files - probably simply delete unused files when saving the page
Support of tables. Currently an issue since the QTextTableCell is missing the python methods for begin() and end(), so that it is not possible to traverse the table cells contents.
Show current cursor position (line/column)
Code blocks as part of a list
Style Editor
MathML integration
Thumbnail view of all Images contained in a Notepad
Version Control of pages
Syntax highlighting inside code blocks
Spell checker
Inline resizing of images through some kind of handles - this will most likely require the implementation of a custom text object, see http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtsvg-richtext-textobject-example.html
